DOC.brief_summary: This study compare two approach measurement fatty acid oxidation ( ketone body flux ketone body concentration ) determine method demonstrate superior sensitivity variability detection moderate increase ketogenesis rate .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Measurements Ketone Body Flux Versus Ketone Body Concentration Pharmacodynamic Marker Hepatic Fatty Acid Oxidation ( 0000-110 )
DOC.criteria: Subject Body Mass Index 1825 kg/m2 OR 2940 kg/m2 Subject nonsmoker use nicotine past 6 month Subject history diabetes mellitus Subject history stroke , chronic seizure , neurological disorder Subject history cancer , except certain skin cancer Subject consume 3 alcoholic beverage per day Subject consume 6 serving caffeinated beverage per day Subject multiple and/or severe allergy food drug Subject allergy sensitivity egg soy Subject regularly us illicit drug history drug alcohol abuse
